txt.en: The leader of the Jeweller's Guild has asked to you to please craft a guild-pattern ithilharn bracelet to cheer up the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nForge a guild-pattern ithilharn bracelet.
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern ithilharn bracelet

'Ah, hello jeweller. I'll confess I've been flaunting your work to the other guild leaders, and the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild seems to be infatuated by ithilharn. They seem to be going through a trying time, right now. Perhaps you could make them something special?'

'Ah, hello jeweller. I'll confess I've been flaunting your work to the other guild leaders, and the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild seems to be infatuated by ithilharn. They seem to be going through a trying time, right now. Perhaps you could make them something special?'
Turn in a guild-pattern ithilharn bracelet ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Aldúlf
'You have drawn out the best qualities of the ithilharn.'
Talk to the Jeweller's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in a guild-pattern ithilharn bracelet ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Jeweller's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
'You have drawn out the best qualities of the ithilharn.'
